title: S2 Ep12: Creating social cohesion in Turkey's schools
itunes:title: Creating social cohesion in Turkey's schools
description: Turkey has received 4m refugees from Syria, a quarter of them children. How can its schools integrate so many new students, help them to make friends and to learn a new language? Sule Alan tells Tim Phillips about a program that has successfully built social cohesion in Turkey's schools.
